ISO: up to 12800 ISO with little noise

color: white, black, red, purple, pink, or blue
effects: 14 photo effects (big eyes, skin softening, miniature, etc.)

preset_modes: 27 exposure modes (e.g. beach, snow, soft skin)
effects: 13 advanced filters (sepia, toy camera, soft focus, etc.)
long_exposure: up to 30 seconds, with bulb mode expose as long as you want
